author: Paige Lavender
title: Read Michael Flynn's Resignation Letter | The Huffington Post
text:
Read Michael Flynn's Resignation Letter Flynn said he was "honored" to serve in Trump's administration. 02/13/2017 11:32 pm ET Paige Lavender Senior Politics Editor, The Huffington Post Carlos Barria / Reuters Retired Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn resigned as national security advisor to President Donald Trump on Monday night. 
President Donald Trump’s national security adviser, Michael Flynn , resigned Monday evening amid controversy over discussions he had about U.S. sanctions against Russia with that country’s ambassador. 
Flynn’s discussions with Russian ambassador Sergey Kislyak took place before Trump’s inauguration. 
Flynn said he was “honored” to serve in Trump’s administration . 
Read more here , and read Flynn’s resignation letter below:
